title: Big Data Analytics
Description: Big Data Analytics  Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ) to practice Big Data Analytics basic quiz answers

questions.question: As companies move past the experimental phase with Hadoop, many cite the need for additional capabilities, including _______________

answers.Answer: Improved data storage and information retrieval
Improved extract, transform and load features for data integration
Improved security, workload management, and SQL support
Hadoop do need specialized hardware to process the data
Hadoop 2.0 allows live stream processing of real-time data
In the Hadoop programming framework output files are divided into lines or records

questions.question: According to analysts, for what can traditional IT systems provide a foundation when they’re integrated with big data technologies like Hadoop?

answers.Answer: Big data management and data mining

questions.question: All of the following accurately describe Hadoop, EXCEPT ____________
__________ has the world’s largest Hadoop cluster.
